tool.name: ToolDistillator Summarize
tool.description: Aggregate several JSON reports from ToolDistillator
tool.command: tooldistillator --version && mkdir -p input_files && #for $file in $summarize_data cp '$file' ./input_files/ && #end for tooldistillator summarize input_files/* -o summary.json

param.name: summarize_data
param.label: Results in Json format
param.help: Summarize results from tooldistillator in json format

tool.help:
**What it does**
ToolDistillator is a tool to extract information from output files of specific tools, expose it as JSON files, and aggregate over several tools.
This tool here summarize JSON output file from ToolDistillator to only one JSON file
